data.title: Mixed Herbs Calculator
data.statement:
After playing every Resident Evil game ever made, you decided to prepare yourself for a possible zombie apocalypse by planting three different strains (green {{G}}, yellow {{Y}} and red {{R}}) of herbs at home to make healing mixtures.

The herbs can be mixed into 3 different ways:
Mixed Herb {{G}}+{{G}}+{{G}}: Restores a massive amount of health.
Mixed Herb {{G}}+{{G}}+{{Y}}: Restores a moderate amount of health.
Mixed Herb {{G}}+{{R}}+{{Y}}: Restores a massive amount of health and increases maximum health.
You also know that {{G}} herbs can be consumed without mixing with any other.

Your task is to build a calculator that will receive as input a string of herbs and output how many mixtures of each type can be made, considering the following priority:

`{{G}}+{{R}}+{{Y}}
{{G}}+{{G}}+{{Y}}
{{G}}+{{G}}+{{G}}`
You should also output the remainder of green {{G}} herbs that wasn't used in the mixtures.

testCases.title: You Want S.T.A.R.S? I'll Give You Stars!

data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A string [[herbs]] to be used in the Mixed Herbs Calculator.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> 4 space-separated integers for the total of each mixed herbs and the total of green herbs not used.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

After playing every Resident Evil game ever made, you decided to prepare yourself for a possible zombie apocalypse by planting three different strains (green G, yellow Y and red R) of herbs at home to make healing mixtures.

The herbs can be mixed into 3 different ways:
Mixed Herb G+G+G: Restores a massive amount of health.
Mixed Herb G+G+Y: Restores a moderate amount of health.
Mixed Herb G+R+Y: Restores a massive amount of health and increases maximum health.
You also know that G herbs can be consumed without mixing with any other.

Your task is to build a calculator that will receive as input a string of herbs and output how many mixtures of each type can be made, considering the following priority:

G+R+Y
G+G+Y
G+G+G

You should also output the remainder of green G herbs that wasn't used in the mixtures.
Input
Line 1: A string herbs to be used in the Mixed Herbs Calculator.
Output
Line 1 : 4 space-separated integers for the total of each mixed herbs and the total of green herbs not used.
Constraints
length of herbs > 0
Example
Input
GGGGGYGRYG
Output
1 1 1 1
